== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Pi;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03a0/index.htm U+003A0].
  * `&pi;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/03c0/index.htm U+003C0].
